id: My Second Brain | Designed by Notion Recommended Creator
name: My Second Brain | Designed by Notion Recommended Creator
description: Second Brain is a Notion template that helps you organize your thoughts, ideas, and tasks using the PARA (Projects, Areas, Resources, and Archives) method developed by leading productivity expert Tiago Forte and Getting Things Done (GTD) principles. With Notion Second Brain, you can easily manage your projects, areas of focus, resources, notes, goals, and weekly reviews.Key Features1.
